alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; Southern Fauquier (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 08 at 10:46AM EST until January 10 at 11:10PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Virginia... Rappahannock River at Remington affecting Southern Fauquier and Culpeper zones. For the Rappahannock River...including Remington...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Rappahannock River at Remington. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Tin Pot Run Road and Sumerduck Road near Remington are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 4.1 feet, or 10.9 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Please visit weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Mon Tue Tue Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7PM 1AM 7AM Stg Time Date Rappahannock River Remington 15.0 4.1 Mon 10 am 3.8 3.6 3.4 15.9 1pm Wed &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/washington or weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM EST.
